mapper.select: select c.cno as cno, c.cname as cname, uc.ucnt as ucnt, p.pno as pno from (select c.cno, c.cname from company c join users u on c.cno = u.cno where u.uno = #{uno}) c left join (select cno, count(*) as ucnt from users group by cno ) uc on c.cno = uc.cno inner join project p on trim(p.pname) = trim(c.cname)

select d.dno as dno, d.dname as dname, u.cno as cno, u.ucnt as ucnt, p.pno as pno from (select d.dno, d.dname from dept d join users u on d.dno = u.dno where u.uno = #{uno}) d inner join (select u.dno, u.cno, count(*) as ucnt from users u group by u.dno, u.cno ) u on d.dno = u.dno inner join project p on trim(p.pname) = trim(d.dname) where u.cno = #{cno} and u.dno = #{dno}

select pj.pno, pj.pname, pj.popen, pjm.pjmembercnt, pjteam.dname, a.cnt from project pj full outer join (select pno, uno, count(acount) as cnt from alert a group by pno, uno, acount having uno = #{uno} and acount=1) a on pj.pno = a.pno inner join (select * from project_member where uno= #{uno}) pju on pj.pno = pju.pno inner join (select pno, count(*) as pjmembercnt from project_member group by pno order by pno ) pjm on pj.pno = pjm.pno left join (select pjd.pno, LISTAGG(d.dname,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY d.dname) AS dname from project_dept pjd, dept d where d.dno = pjd.dno group by pjd.pno) pjteam on pj.pno = pjteam.pno group by pj.pno, pj.pname, pj.popen, pjm.pjmembercnt, pjteam.dname, a.cnt order by pj.pno asc

select pj.pno as pj_pno, pj.pname as pj_pname, pj.popen as pj_open, pjm.pjmembercnt as pjmembercnt, pjteam.dname as pjteam from project pj inner join (select * from project_member where uno= #{uno}) pju on pj.pno = pju.pno inner join (select pno, count(*) as pjmembercnt from project_member group by pno order by pno ) pjm on pj.pno = pjm.pno left join (select pjd.pno, LISTAGG(d.dname,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY d.dname) AS dname from project_dept pjd, dept d where d.dno = pjd.dno group by pjd.pno) pjteam on pj.pno = pjteam.pno where pjteam.dname is null order by pj.pno asc

select pj.pno as pj_pno, pj.pname as pj_pname, pj.popen as pj_open, pjm.pjmembercnt as pjmembercnt, pjteam.dname as pjteam from project pj inner join (select * from project_member where uno= #{uno}) pju on pj.pno = pju.pno inner join (select pno, count(*) as pjmembercnt from project_member group by pno order by pno ) pjm on pj.pno = pjm.pno left join (select pjd.pno, LISTAGG(d.dname,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY d.dname) AS dname from project_dept pjd, dept d where d.dno = pjd.dno group by pjd.pno) pjteam on pj.pno = pjteam.pno where pjteam.dname like '%${dname}%' order by pj.pno asc
mapper.insert: insert into project values( PNO_SE.NEXTVAL, #{pname}, #{pdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{popen} )
